title: Ministry Of Music
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Indian, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian restaurant (with vegan options) and personal development school. Serves alkaline meals. A Kangen water purifying machine is available. Ask helpful staff about supplements, advice on life and more. Reportedly all veg, but now offering meat.
